name: Faedon
description:
Overview

After three centures of war an unlikely plot emerges which gives the Kefien a chance to find peace with the ruthless and cruel Kethir. 

You'll guide Malachi on his quest to end the war and bring peace back to the Kingdom of Faedon.

Malachi's origins, strength, power and fate are all on the line. What choices will you make? The right ones or the wrong ones? Everything matters.

Features

  • Turn-based combat system
  • A lot of lore
  • Gathering/crafting system
  • Fun and intuitive gameplay
  • Non-linear exploration
  • A huge open world
  • Choices matter
